website_summaries.verdict: A double-duty air hockey table that can also be used to play table tennis. Price is not outlandish - a good choice for occasional to moderate use.
pros: Stands out for its sleek surface which provides smooth gliding action
Price is affordable, and it's easy to set up
cons: Some users say the blower is a bit laggy and could use more power

customer_reviews.title: The woman who supported me through the order was nice but the net result was terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product came broken. I received it in the box which appeared to be unharmed. I was in the process of renovating my basement into a playroom. Once it was complete I opened up the box to find the damage. When I went to return it they said my window had expired. The woman who supported me through the order was nice but the net result was terrible. A broken table, out $350... me left holding the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Air hockey portion - amazing!! The table tennis was disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: We have only played the air hockey part of this. The air hockey is absolutely fantastic for all ages. When we have younger kids here (about 7 yo and smaller), we give them a stool. For everyone else, including adults, the height is perfect. We have not had it long, but we have had many hours of fun!! We have not been able to try out the table tennis portion. The table tennis balls arrived broken and the paddles aren't typical of table tennis paddles. I anticipate that we will have to purchase a separate set of paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow folks... read the reviews on this one! Half the holes don’t blow any air. The air that does seem to seep through, smells... and not like roses! Not a full-size ping pong table. Intermittent sounds and scoring.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H

customer_reviews.title: Presents itself well but beware of damage.
customer_reviews.text: Was damaged when received and the packaging was not damaged. I contacted the seller and they gave me some (minimal) credit towards the purchase. The damage was structural to the table and severe. I'm going to try to make the repair. The table looks nice, presents itself well, ping pong portion to the top is slightly warped and not flush, creating a step for the ball to bounce back on.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: make sure you store the ping pong boards flat to avoid warping.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery is not an indoor delivery. The box had to be open in the garage and taken in in parts. The air hockey table is heavy, so strong helpful hands is a must. Keep those helping hands around because when it comes to flipping it over, you're going to need them! The outer box was beat up, but no damage to the product, pleasingly. Once set up the table is sturdy! Great for the money! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary   G.    Scott

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are very small and indecipherable. Scoreboard did not work. Designed with a piece of wood to be placed on air jockey table to support ping pong table. Unfortunately the piece of wood, while supporting ping pong table, damages the air hockey table. Terrible design and execution.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Charter

customer_reviews.title: Air hockey table works great but the detail finishes leave something to be desired
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Air hockey table works great but the detail finishes leave something to be desired. Table tennis table leaves something to be desired. My kids play on it occasionally when they have friends over. It was worth the couple hundred bucks I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE!  BAD QUALITY!! HORRIBLE RETURN EXPERIENCE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!!!! Came broken with a HUGE hole in it. Very Cheap quality as well! The ping pong option is bad. 3 pieces for the top? Made no sense! Then as I try to RETURN this broken item. 3 months of filing claims with amazon. They want to pick up the table and no one comes. On the phone with amazon for months!!! Bought this in March, June 3rd still havnt got my money back! AND THE recycling that comes with this. BUYERS BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice air hockey table!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really terrific air hockey table. It is very heavy, so you will need 2-3 people to help get it in the house and set up. It’s easy to assemble. Very fun to play. The ping pong table sits right on top of the air hockey top very well. The kids love it. We’ve played it for 3 months and it’s working great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Koeppel

customer_reviews.title: Great table and customer service is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome. It is heavy though. 1 person can build it but you will need two adults to pick it up and flip it once built (you build it face down). Customer service is awesome. Had a minor issue with a cracked board. Called up and a replacement part was issued right away. They also stock all parts in the event you need a replacement. Oh and this table is big. You and your family will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: Good hockey table, but
customer_reviews.text: The table is very solid and was relatively easy to assemble. My only concerns have been that the pieces of the ping pong top do not fit together perfectly -- there has been slight, but inconsistent, warping of the three pieces. Also, one of the two net posts broke the first time my son tried to remove it. He should have been more careful, but the posts are fairly cheap plastic and certainly prone to such an accident. All in all, though, I am satisfied with the air hockey table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality table for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! My 9 and 12 year old are on it all the time. The tennis top works great but in 3 pieces so a little of a pain but they still have a blast! I did alot of research and this is a quality table for money!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 stars - a few flaws but otherwise right on the money
customer_reviews.text: Nicer and heavier than I expected. Ping pong table is nice though unneeded. Table does scuff easily from the puck. Wish the game timer was integrated into the on/off but it requires its own batteries and switch when playing, very entertaining and worth the $
customer_reviews.author: JennF

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This product was installed by amazon services however my kids love it. It is the perfect value for money. I would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pooja

customer_reviews.title: Good experience with seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came with no damage and was fairly easy to put together. My kids are enjoying both the air hockey and ping pong games. The seller solved the issue we had with deliver and I greatly appreciate their assistance in that matter!!! I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for the entire family.
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun for the family. An incredibly sturdy table for people of all ages. Got this for the grandsons (4, 6, and 8), but it is also large enough for adults. Splayed legs make it extremely stable. Expect this to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Good Hockey table
customer_reviews.text: The table works great. It is a big hit with the grandkids and adults alike. It arrived 2 weeks past the scheduled delivery and had a minor break that we were able to fix. Overall, the table is a good one. Be careful of the shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great air hockey table!! Very sturdy and nice quality. Pretty easy to assemble (20 minutes). Excellent seller as well!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition. This is a better quality than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. This is a better quality than I expected. Our family has been having a great time with the air hockey part. We haven’t tried the ping pong yet, but it is nice to have that option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great AirHockey Table
customer_reviews.text: Eastpoint air hockey table is awesome sturdy lots of fun well worth the money would recommend highly to anyone interested in one.
customer_reviews.author: leon pouncey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great, the only complaint is that the ping pong table top came in 3 pieces and the middle piece is warped some and doesn't line up.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: table decent but it came with a hole in it and seller did nothing to help the situation
customer_reviews.author: John Randall Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Bought it for the grandkids as a Christmas gift. They love it and play daily. Very heavy table. Make sure to have some strong backs to help move it. Setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Alan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great game table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game table. Sturdy, and larger like the ones in the arcades. We looked at many and preferred this one due to price and free shipping at the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for preteen boys!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Huge. Sturdy. As good as any arcade. Kids love it. Even hosting air hockey tournament with classmates.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble. Very reasonable price for the quality and size and a lot of fun. My kids, my husband and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: rfso

customer_reviews.title: Paddles are not of the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for granddaughters loved it. Biggest problem is getting them to leave it. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Ron

customer_reviews.title: Air hockey table is great, works very well
customer_reviews.text: Air hockey table is great, works very well. Ping pong table was warped, one of the net holders broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it works wonderfully! It's a fun and safe set of two ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a game at home for my family. It took some work to put it together, but it works wonderfully! It's a fun and safe set of two games to play everyday. I like the size of it also, because it fits in our home space this way and still is fun to play. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for ping pong and air hokey to go for it!
customer_reviews.author: random person

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren absolutely loved it. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren absolutely loved it. Thank you. The ordering of the table and the mailing out of state , Everything was fantastic Thank you again. Can't wait for a visit so I can play..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys and their friends love it! Spend hours playing!
customer_reviews.author: HellWright

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy! Nuts not threaded properly, impossible to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 bolts for each leg. First leg went in fine. Second leg however, did not. 2 out of the 3 bolts simply won't enter the nut that is afixed into the table. Both nuts were pushed out of their spot in the table. Incredibly frustrating. I have an email into their customer service, will see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was excellent! Three layers of card board plus Styrofoam around the table. It would take alot to damage this in shipping. I was able to put the table together with no issues. Also there are good videos online if you need help. The air hockey works great! Airflow is uniform throughout the table. The scoreboard works good. The only thing that I would change is to have a slightly heavier Puck. It can fly off the table if is hit too hard. The ping pong table works good. It just sits on top of the table so it could slide around, but I have had no issues. The family is very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy air hockey table
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy air hockey table. A bit smaller than the arcade version and needs a set of heavier or slightly bigger pucks, but it works great and lots of fun for kids and adults alike. The ping pong table comes in 3 parts that don't lock into each other so the surface is slightly uneven between them. Easily fixed by screwing in a few wooden guides. The paddles are plastic and ping pong balls are very cheaply made. You'll probably want a better set of both to enjoy ping pong. Overall, it absolutely cannot be beat for the price. Arrived on time and in excellent condition. Easy assembly in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Small problem became no problem with GREAT customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Very good experience dealing with Cyber Discounts. Had a bit of an issue with delivery and the table arrived with some damage. This could have been a huge problem but Cyber Discounts went above and beyond to come to a resolution. First impression of the table is great and our friends and family love it. Blower is strong enough to support heavier pucks for big kids and adults. Littles are fine with the pucks that come with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crownover

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table and a Great Vendor
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. Air hockey is smooth and the feet are adjustable to level the table. My 13 and 11 year old (and Mom and Dad) love it. Ping Pong table rests on top with little or no overhang. It slides a little if the play gets too "energetic", i.e. you bump the table too much. Two thumbs up to Eastpoint Sports (who I think is the importer or distributor): We broke one of the posts that holds the ping pong net so I called them and they are sending a replacement free of charge, including no "shipping & handling" - they told me the first one was "on them".
customer_reviews.author: Jim Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Good product for its price
customer_reviews.text: Incredible table for the price. It's not that fancy as the ones in main event or other arcade centers, it's a good quality table with the extra pingpong top that could be nicer if was made of 2 solid pieces rather than 3 and would be a little lighter so kids can easily put it on, maybe Eastpoint can consider plywood instead plastic with dent resistant layer for next version of it.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

product_meta.title: EastPoint Sports
feature_bullets: 2-in-1 game table set for hover hockey and table tennis
The GlazeTek playfield coating provides scratch resistance and long-lasting shine
Leg leveling system ensures easy setup and perfectly balanced play for both great games
In-rail automatic LED electronic scoring and sound keeps track of all the action so you don't have to
Set includes: 1 hover hockey table, 2 pushers, 2 pucks, 2 table tennis paddles, 2 balls, and 1 net and post system

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
